General.Name: Jeil Steel Mfg Co. Ltd
General.Description: J Steel Company Holdings Inc. manufactures and sells rolling steel products in South Korea. It offers mild steel wire rods, deformed bars, hard steel wire rods, and reinforced steel bars to construction companies. The company was formerly known as Jeil Steel Mfg Co., Ltd. and changed its name to J Steel Company Holdings Inc. in March 2022. J Steel Company Holdings Inc. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.
General.Address: 301, Shihwa Ind, Complex, Ansan-Si, South Korea
